üöÄ We‚Äôre Hiring: Growth Leads at Shopdeck!
At Shopdeck, we‚Äôre on a mission to Democratise D2C Online Commerce, empowering emerging D2C brands with an all-in-one stack for sustainable growth and profitability.

We‚Äôre looking for Growth Leads who will work closely with founders of emerging D2C brands to drive business strategy, optimize revenue, and scale operations‚Äîall while ensuring profitability.

What‚Äôs in it for you?
‚ú® Impactful Work: Solve real-world challenges with D2C founders.
üéØ Hands-on Learning: Dive deep into revenue optimization, pricing, marketing strategies, and logistics.
üì¶ Category Expertise: Build specialized skills across consumer product categories.
üåü Culture of Growth: Thrive in a supportive, forward-thinking team.

We‚Äôre Looking For:
- 0-3 years of experience.
- Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills (Hindi & English).
- A passion for D2C brands and an entrepreneurial mindset.
- Ability to join full-time within 30 days.

Ready to make an impact?
üëâ Apply here:

Help us spread the word by sharing this opportunity within your network!

Founder, ShopDeck | Hiring, reach out at harmin@blitzscale.co
At ShopDeck, our mission has always been simple yet powerful: to make D2C profitable for everyone. Today, we‚Äôre overjoyed to share a significant milestone on this journey ‚Äî we‚Äôve raised $8 million in funding! Deep gratitude for the incredible belief and support of,,, and.

ShopDeck is a D2C-in-a-box solution which helps brands sell profitably on their own channel. Shopdeck is a trusted growth partner for every brand with big dreams in the D2C space.

This funding fuels our passion to do more. We will focus on enhancing the AI-powered tech stack to drive deeper insights and automation, expanding on-ground operations to support sellers across Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities, scaling the team and executing our go-to-market strategies.

To every team member, customer, investor, and supporter who has been part of this incredible journey, thank you. This is just the beginning. We‚Äôre building the future of D2C, let‚Äôs keep growing together!

A big thanks to,,&for their continued support.

A heartfelt thanks to our incredible team& all the others ‚Äî this achievement wouldn't have been possible without your dedication and hard work!
‚Ä¶more

Startups redefine the world. We want to enable this change globally. Working with the smartest founders and helping their teams scale in an effective manner is the path we chose to create meaningful impact. Long-term sustainable growth and scale happen when there is strength across all important aspects of an organization not just with the core product and the customers, and that's what we help startups with.

xto10x | Scaling is hard. We make it a little easier.
xto10x | Scaling is hard. We make it a little easier.

A lot of times startups and entrepreneurs need a third-person perspective and in many cases, even solid strategic advise to validate decision making. This is where we step in. We are your soundboard. We bring in a fresh external perspective along with an igniting passion for entrepreneurship. Our expertise lies in GTM Strategy, Financial modelling, Customer Analytics & Organization Development.
